00133 
00134     class same_direction_sorter {
00135     private:
00136         SUMOReal myAngle;
00137 
00138     public:
00140         explicit same_direction_sorter(SUMOReal angle)
00141             : myAngle(angle) { }
00142 
00143     public:
00145         int operator()(NIVissimConnection* c1, NIVissimConnection* c2) const {
00146             return
00147                 fabs(c1->getGeometry().beginEndAngle() - myAngle)
00148                 <
00149                 fabs(c2->getGeometry().beginEndAngle() - myAngle);
00150         }
00151     };
00152
